idea: Smilee Live is the World's 1st live services aggregator handcrafted in India which will enable hundreds and thousands of independent freelancers, consultants, coaches, teachers, mentors, artists to earn money at the comfort of their houses. For the first time live streaming would be used as an aggregator which will connect Service Providers with the Service Takers all over the world. It is the go-to platform for live streaming which uses live streaming as the core competency rather than an added feature. Smilee Live has been supported & backed by the Indian entity of Amazon Web Services (AWS) for all its infrastructure setup costs. Now events and infotainment will be at your finger tips.
name: PAVLABS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are starting the business for supply of High speed diesel (HSD) for stationery equipment which is in accordance with the Ministry of Petroleum & Natural Gas in the Gazette of India: Extraordinary dated 10th December’ 2019 and 3rd February’ 2020 vide G.S.R. 903(E) and G.S.R. 78(E) respectively with regard to amendment of the Motor Spirit and High Speed Diesel (Regulation of Supply, Distribution and Prevention of Malpractices) Order, 2005.

This initiative would help in reducing the risk of life which used to occur due to the risk involve in carrying petroleum products which was not done as per the proper standard & safety of handling petroleum product. Further this will also reduce the pilferage of petroleum product which used to occur when there were proper ways of handling petroleum products.

We are applying to Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited (HPCL) as per their offer through Expression of Interest (EOI) from START UPS for enrolment with HPCL as “Door to Door Delivery Reseller(Fuel Ent)” for the purpose of uplifting High speed diesel (HSD) from Supply locations/Retail Outlets of HPCL in approved mobile dispenser only for resellingof the same by way of door to door delivery to the consumers.
name: EKDANI FUEL SERVICE LLP

idea: DODHIA DOOR TO DOOR SUPPLY FUELLING LLP is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your generator (DG sets) / cars/fleet vehicles etc. in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. You can place your order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to your chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter! When everything in the world is available online, we are coming with providing online home delivery of fuel. This will helps to generate the employment opportunity and creates the job opportunity.
name: DODHIA DOOR TO DOOR SUPPLY FUELLING LLP

idea:
Battery life 2 has developed process technology using patented technology equipment for desulfation Lead Acid Batteries of all types.

We don't use any kind of additives or chemicals except distilled water nor open the batteries. 

 Already completed over 3000 battery regeneration across India and now getting a contract to do the same in Zambia. 

We cater to 

Mobile tower, 

Forklift, 

Solar off-grid and UPS battery,                  

E rickshaw,

Banks ATMs and Branches, 

Corporate offices, 

Electricity supply substation batteries 

etc.
name: BATTERY LIFE 2
